remarks: Covering property of a lattice automorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
lautcvr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautcvr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lautcvr.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
lautcvr $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ ( F e. I /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X C Y <-> ( F ` X ) C ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
